scripts.build:night: parcel build app-night.html --dist-dir dist --public-url ./ && node inline.js
scripts.build:light: parcel build app-light.html --dist-dir dist --public-url ./ && node inline.js
scripts.build: bun run clear && bun run build:night && bun run build:light
scripts.prerelease: bun run build && cp dist/app-night.html ../app/src/main/res/raw/app-night.html && cp dist/app-light.html ../app/src/main/res/raw/app-light.html
